subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Weight Lifting
lead_paragraph: Melanie Roach, whose road to Beijing has been longer and more winding than many Olympic hopefuls, emerged from the United States weight lifting trials in Atlanta as the nation’s top qualifier.
snippet: Melanie Roach, whose road to Beijing has been longer and more winding than many Olympic hopefuls, emerged from the United States weight lifting trials in Atlanta as the nation’s top qualifier.
